```{r}
library(tidyverse)

res <- read_rds(params$results)

```

```{r}
#| results: asis

imap_chr(res, \(x, title) {
  
  text <- glue::glue(
    '# {title}',
    '```{{r}}',
    '#| fig-height: 10',
    '#| fig-width: 8',
    'x',
    '```',
    .sep = '\n'
  )
  
  knitr::knit_child(text = text, quiet = TRUE, envir = environment())
  
}) |> cat(sep = '\n')
```
